english: Treatment of children ' s asthma during remission with chinese medicine in four seasons
chinese: 儿童哮喘缓解期的中医四季治疗

english: Study on prospective efficacy of zhenpi decoction on paracme of ulcerative colitis
chinese: 振脾汤对溃疡性结肠炎缓解期远期疗效的研究

english: Rehabilitation guide of 32 chronic obstructive pulmonary disease cases in remission stage
chinese: 缓解期慢性阻塞性肺疾病32侧的康复指导

english: Observation on therapeutic effect of acupuncture on no - premonitory migraine at remission stage
chinese: 针刺治疗缓解期无先兆偏头痛疗效观察

english: Professor wang shouchuan s experience in treating the remission stage of pediatric asthma based on lung theory
chinese: 汪受传从肺论治小儿哮喘缓解期的经验
缓解期造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Clinical observation on treatment 31 cases of chronic bronchitis at remission stage with bu fei granules
chinese: 补肺颗粒治疗慢性支气管炎缓解期31例临床观察

chinese: 缓解期重性抑郁与心境恶劣患者人格特征及人格障碍研究

english: On examination the main physical sign is tenderness in the epigastrium or right hypochondria , but between attacks this may be absent
chinese: 检查时，患者主要的体征为；上腹部和右季肋部有压痛，但在缓解期可无上述体征表现。

english: The study also found that " on " time without dyskinesia after awakening was more than doubled in the two rotigotine groups compared with placebo
chinese: 本研究也发现唤醒后没有运动障碍的缓解期两种目标剂量的罗替戈汀组比安慰剂组长两倍多。

english: Objective : this paper reviews the influence of rescue medications administered in the prodrome on the prevention of psychotic relapse in remitted schizophrenia patients
chinese: 目的：本文回顾了有关给予缓解期精神分裂症病人前驱症状救护性治疗对预防精神病复发的影响。

english: Clinical experience to date suggests stem cell therapy for inflammatory bowel disorders can promote longer periods of remission and reduce the frequency and duration of relapses
chinese: 临床实验显示通过对炎性肠病的干细胞治疗能延长缓解期及缩短复发期的频率和持续时间。
